$interpreted: Puggi: I'm all out of breath. Why we going soooo far, far away?
Pang: A revered martial artist resides within Maple Lake.
Pang: I aspire to become his apprentice, and one day become a master myself.
Puggi: My God ~ With that face of yours, you'd scare anyone half to death! No need to learn combat!
Puggi: Without a name, how will you find him?
Pang: Someone's bound to know where he resides.
Pang: Met many formidable foes on this journey.
Pang: Even if they do not pose a threat to me, I still must become stronger for the sake of my dearest friends.
Pang: To be on the safe side, you should pick up some karate pork chops as well. You hear me Puggi......
Pang: Puggi?
Pang: Son of a biscuit...Puggi, where are you? STOP PLAYING GAMES!
Pang: Puggi? PUGGI!
Pang: That little egg noggin' better not have his sunny side up when I find him...
Pang: Eh? What's this about?
Karnulla: Argh...if it weren't for protecting my bambinos, someone as tough as me would have never been injured by outsiders like you!
Pang: Sir, how are you holding up?
Karnulla: Never thought someone would come to my aid...You have my gratitude. I'm Karnulla, and you are?
Pang: Pang, from the East...
Pang: ...Uhh!
Karnulla: Hey, what's the matter?
Pang: ...A tiny nick, nothing bad.
Karnulla: Oh no, that won't do! Bambinos, escort my savior back to territory! Treat to his wounds and bring the finest dishes to serve our honorable guest!
Pang: I'm barely hurt, it's fine...
Karnulla: Don't be shy! Bambinos, get your hustle on!
Karnulla: Hehe~ That finisher you delivered shut those beasts down! Kudos!
Pang: You wrestled against that beast for your kin. No doubt, we are both warriors cut from the same cloth.
Karnulla: You're quite the smooth talker, hehe!
Karnulla: Well? Your wound still tender to the touch?
Pang: No longer, thanks to your medicine and food. Been a long while since I've enjoyed such hospitality.
Karnulla: Huh. Well ain't that a first, I've never been thanked!
Karnulla: You've earned my respect, let's be friends!
Pang: Friends......
Pang: AHH!!
Karnulla: Love thy neighbour as thyself. Is something the matter?
Pang: No, not you. I've forgotten that my companion's whereabouts are still unknown. This is worrying.
Karnulla: Must be out there somewhere, how bad could it be?
Pang: Those tiny drumstick legs march to a reckless beat. Surely he shall stir up a ruckus within Maple Lake.
Karnulla: Seems quite serious... alright. Go on and bring back your buddy first~
Pang: Once I've found him, I'll return.
Karnulla: That's a deal. I shall await for you here!
Pang: Ugh. Forgot about the martial arts master...
Pang: Oh well, there's always later.

Model.Text: I'm all out of breath. Why we going soooo far, far away?
A revered martial artist resides within Maple Lake.
I aspire to become his apprentice, and one day become a master myself.
My God ~ With that face of yours, you'd scare anyone half to death! No need to learn combat!
Without a name, how will you find him?
Someone's bound to know where he resides.
Met many formidable foes on this journey.
Even if they do not pose a threat to me, I still must become stronger for the sake of my dearest friends.
To be on the safe side, you should pick up some karate pork chops as well. You hear me Puggi......
Puggi?
Son of a biscuit...Puggi, where are you? STOP PLAYING GAMES!
Puggi? PUGGI!
That little egg noggin' better not have his sunny side up when I find him...
Eh? What's this about?
Argh...if it weren't for protecting my bambinos, someone as tough as me would have never been injured by outsiders like you!
Sir, how are you holding up?
Never thought someone would come to my aid...You have my gratitude. I'm Karnulla, and you are?
Pang, from the East...
...Uhh!
Hey, what's the matter?
...A tiny nick, nothing bad.
Oh no, that won't do! Bambinos, escort my savior back to territory! Treat to his wounds and bring the finest dishes to serve our honorable guest!
I'm barely hurt, it's fine...
Don't be shy! Bambinos, get your hustle on!
Hehe~ That finisher you delivered shut those beasts down! Kudos!
You wrestled against that beast for your kin. No doubt, we are both warriors cut from the same cloth.
You're quite the smooth talker, hehe!
Well? Your wound still tender to the touch?
No longer, thanks to your medicine and food. Been a long while since I've enjoyed such hospitality.
Huh. Well ain't that a first, I've never been thanked!
You've earned my respect, let's be friends!
Friends......
AHH!!
Love thy neighbour as thyself. Is something the matter?
No, not you. I've forgotten that my companion's whereabouts are still unknown. This is worrying.
Must be out there somewhere, how bad could it be?
Those tiny drumstick legs march to a reckless beat. Surely he shall stir up a ruckus within Maple Lake.
Seems quite serious... alright. Go on and bring back your buddy first~
Once I've found him, I'll return.
That's a deal. I shall await for you here!
Ugh. Forgot about the martial arts master...
Oh well, there's always later.
